alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 19 at 8:57PM AKDT until May 20 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKDT SATURDAY FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... * AFFECTED AREA...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * TIMING...Until 1 AM AKDT Saturday. * WINDS...Northeast 5 to 15 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 19 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 50s. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
